forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 57F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers following a period of rain and wind early. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing late. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening light rain. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Partial clearing late. Low near 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. SW winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. SW winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low near 45F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 56F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 45F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 58F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 14C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 59F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 61F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 48F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
